title: Robo-advisor portfolio statements (Betterment, Wealthfront)
dataVerified: Account holder, portfolio value, holdings, performance, advisor
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake portfolio statements (Madoff scenario). Domain binding verifies robo-advisor. Tamper-evident account balance. Regulatory compliance (SEC RIA requirements). Tax reporting accuracy. Investor protection.
